content:
x.py doc compiler/ is failing with tons and tons of errors like the following:

error: cannot find macro `quote` in this scope
  --> compiler/rustc_macros/src/lift.rs:44:9
   |
44 |         quote! {
   |         ^^^^^
   |
   = note: consider importing this macro:
           proc_macro::quote

Anyone else experiencing this?
I'm also noticing this when running ./x.py doc compiler on master.
You may need to pass --stage 1 or something like that
